commentText: Returns the stats, including group specific stats. If the groups are null/0 length, then nothing_is returned for them. If they are set, then only groups provided will be returned, or_<tt>_all</tt> for all groups.
codeText: public SearchStats stats(String... groups) {_        SearchStats.Stats total = totalStats.stats()__        Map<String, SearchStats.Stats> groupsSt = null__        if (groups != null && groups.length > 0) {_            groupsSt = new HashMap<>(groupsStats.size())__            if (groups.length == 1 && groups[0].equals("_all")) {_                for (Map.Entry<String, StatsHolder> entry : groupsStats.entrySet()) {_                    groupsSt.put(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue().stats())__                }_            } else {_                for (Map.Entry<String, StatsHolder> entry : groupsStats.entrySet()) {_                    if (Regex.simpleMatch(groups, entry.getKey())) {_                        groupsSt.put(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue().stats())__                    }_                }_            }_        }_        return new SearchStats(total, openContexts.count(), groupsSt)__    }
